text: Angelo State University is a public university in San Angelo, Texas. It started in 1928. As of 2008, it had about 6,150 students. The sports teams at Angelo State are called Rams for the men and Rambelles for the women. ==References== ==Other websites== *Angelo State University Category:Colleges and universities in Texas Category:1928 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in Texas
title: Angelo State University
